description: Level 3 data products are variables mapped on uniform space-time grid scales and are the result of combining multiple scenes (e.g. S1/S5/S10) to cover the user region of interest.
title: PROBA-V S5 TOA 100 m COG: 100 m resolution best-quality daily synthesis, COG format. Maximum Value Compositing (MVC) is applied - Collection 2
license: Products can be freely downloaded after registration / Licence: https://proba-v.vgt.vito.be/en/data-policy
